item.title: Adam Czepielik
item.author: adam.czepielik@gmail.com (Adam Czepielik)
item.description: I am a graduate student of Mathematics at the Jagiellonian University in Krak√≥w and a data analysis enthusiast. As I owe a lot to many blog and tutorials authors, I have decided to start a blog by my own, to share some of my data insights. Education Autumn semester 2018⁄19 KU Leuven (Belgium) Erasmus+ exchange From October 2017 Jagiellonian University Graduate student of Mathematics Master thesis on clustering categorical data with usage of correspondence analysis (ongoing) Member of the Financial Mathematics Student Association 2014 - 2017 Jagiellonian University Undergraduate student of Mathematics Bachelor Thesis about product measures on non sigma-finite spaces (pdf, in Polish) Extracurricular courses Data Camp Data Scientist with R Machine Learning with R Pelikan (workshops held by JU) Introduction to R Basics of machine learning in Python Microsoft SQL Server Analysis Services Institute of Classical Philology, JU Two-semester course of ancient Greek with first-year students
